author: trent_vanepps
content: uh this is simply not true

author: trent_vanepps
content: i suspect it would be even faster, on the order of weeks

author: 0xsadcat
content: why is it not true? with fees at ~200 gwei it's a network for millionaires. using defi regularly means you're spending upper hundreds if not low thousands per day in fees. you need to be a millionaire for that to make sense

author: trent_vanepps
content: i make transactions pretty regularly.. and I would not spend 5k on a home server

author: 0xsadcat
content: the point is that existing users would actually save money if they had to spend even $5k on a server in exchange for lower fees. but in reality it would be $480 for ssd and that's it
